title: Account Manager HPE Financial Services
description:
This role has been designed as ‘Hybrid’ with an expectation that you will work on average 2 days per week from an HPE office.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 Hewlett Packard Enterprise is the global edge-to-cloud company advancing the way people live and work. We help companies connect, protect, analyze, and act on their data and applications wherever they live, from edge to cloud, so they can turn insights into outcomes at the speed required to thrive in today’s complex world. Our culture thrives on finding new and better ways to accelerate what’s next. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good. If you are looking to stretch and grow your career our culture will embrace you. Open up opportunities with HPE.
   

  

**Job Description**
**Responsibilities:**
* Develops account plans and long-term sales pipeline to increase the company's market share.
* Focuses on larger deals/opportunities and value and/or volume portfolio management, and selling a range of company products and solutions.
* Works with management to develop future business plans; independently determines methods for achieving plans.
* Extensive time spent working with and leveraging a diverse set of external partners.
* Builds strong professional relationships with key IT and business executives, including C level Executives.
* Applies consultative-selling techniques to identify and advance opportunities that result in ongoing profitable revenue growth for the company.
* Maintains high-level of customer loyalty and builds trust and integrity, as indicated in company conducted surveys and reports.
* Advocates for client needs in negotiating solution sales and troubleshooting delivery issues.
* Develops business plan in conjunction with the customer.
* Analyzes client industry and competitive research and information to facilitate rich client dialogue.
* Actively manages the account to protect and grow the company's business; coordinates all account forecasts, planning and reporting.
* Directs and coordinates all activity on account(s).
* Focuses on generating new business and builds, monitors and manages sales pipeline activity.
* Responsible for achieving/managing quarterly, half yearly, annual quota and/or margin.
* Enters all opportunities in pipeline tool and updates them weekly
* Builds a list of customers willing to be a reference in person or print.
* Ability to implement margin recovery activities/strategies.
* Acts as a first interface for international accounts in collaboration with members of global business teams, and local teams.
* Identifies customer requirements, matches with company capabilities and chooses the respective company supply chain accordingly (Volume Direct or Indirect).


**Education And Experience Required**
* University or Bachelor's degree; Advanced degree or MBA preferred.
* Prior selling experience includes multiple, diverse set of selling responsibilities.
* Viewed as expert in given field by company and customer; is a mentor of selling strategy, including designing strategy.
* Typically 12+ years of experience as referenced above.
* 5 years commercial account management experience.
* Highly experienced in product specialty (computers, printers, servers, storage).
* Experience in related industry.


**Knowledge And Skills**
* Knows how to motivate partners to sell our solutions.
* Have excellent time management skills and presentation skills. Is the go to expert for the technology or solution being presented.
* Strong high-level customer management relationship building, especially working with executives in lines of business, and sometime board level.
* High level of negotiation skills at high level customer management.
* Adept at advanced sales negotiations and positioning solution value under pricing pressures from customer IT and procurement professionals.- proactive presentation of value solutions
* Extensive partner organization intelligence and ability to work closely with multiple partners, to engage the client in business solutions.
* Uses financial-selling techniques with the client and company internal to position value and advance sales motions.
* Expertise in managing end- to-end sales processes in complex, large deals.
* Relevant knowledge of client's industry; keeps abreast of trends and lead discussions with IT on strategic directions and linking discussions.
* Strong knowledge of the company's breadth of solutions and engages specialist resources as needed.
* Ability to understand the customer's business issues and translate to the company's solutions.
* Ability to prioritize and drive strategic sales activity on a complex, large deal basis.
* Excels in competitive selling skills.


**Additional Skills**
 Accountability, Accountability, Active Learning, Active Listening, Assertiveness, Bias, Building Rapport, Buyer Personas, Coaching, Complex Sales, Creativity, Critical Thinking, Cross-Functional Teamwork, Customer Experience Strategy, Customer Interactions, Design Thinking, Empathy, Financial Acumen, Follow-Through, Growth Mindset, Identifying Sales Opportunities, Industry Knowledge, Intellectual Curiosity (Inactive), Long Term Planning, Managing Ambiguity {+ 6 more}
   

  

**What We Can Offer You**
**Health & Wellbeing**
 We strive to provide our team members and their loved ones with a comprehensive suite of benefits that supports their physical, financial and emotional wellbeing.
   

  

**Personal & Professional Development**
 We also invest in your career because the better you are, the better we all are. We have specific programs catered to helping you reach any career goals you have — whether you want to become a knowledge expert in your field or apply your skills to another division.
   

  

**Unconditional Inclusion**
 We are unconditionally inclusive in the way we work and celebrate individual uniqueness. We know varied backgrounds are valued and succeed here. We have the flexibility to manage our work and personal needs. We make bold moves, together, and are a force for good.
   

  

**Let's Stay Connected**
 Follow @HPECareers on Instagram to see the latest on people, culture and tech at HPE.
   

  

 #sweden
   

  

 #financialservices
   

  

**Job**
 Sales
   

  

**Job Level**
 Master
   

  

 HPE is an Equal Employment Opportunity/ Veterans/Disabled/LGBT employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, gender, or any other protected category, and all decisions we make are made on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need. Our goal is to be one global team that is representative of our customers, in an inclusive environment where we can continue to innovate and grow together. Please click here: Equal Employment Opportunity.
   

  

**Hewlett Packard Enterprise is EEO Protected Veteran/ Individual with Disabilities.**
 HPE will comply with all applicable laws related to employer use of arrest and conviction records, including laws requiring employers to consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories.
   

  

**No Fees Notice & Recruitment Fraud Disclaimer**
*It has come to HPE’s attention that there has been an increase in recruitment fraud whereby scammer impersonate HPE or HPE-authorized recruiting agencies and offer fake employment opportunities to candidates. These scammers often seek to obtain personal information or money from candidates.*
*Please note that Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE), its direct and indirect subsidiaries and affiliated companies, and its authorized recruitment agencies/vendors

 The credentials of any hiring agency that claims to be working with HPE for recruitment of talent should be verified by candidates and candidates shall be solely responsible to conduct such verification. Any candidate/individual who relies on the erroneous representations made by fraudulent employment agencies does so at their own risk, and HPE disclaims liability for any damages or claims that may result from any such communication.*

title: Konsultchef
description:
**Vi är Redeploy. Ett techkonsultbolag för människor som vill växa, göra skillnad och ha kul längs vägen.**
 Vi designar, bygger, skalar och förvaltar moderna lösningar inom Cloud, Data och AI tillsammans med några av Nordens mest ambitiösa bolag.
   

  

 Nu söker vi en Konsultchef till Stockholm, med fokus på Cloud infra. Det här är en roll för dig som gillar att vara nära både människor och kund, trivs när det är tempo och vill vara med och bygga något som märks. Du blir en nyckelperson i vår fortsatta tillväxt, med ett tydligt uppdrag: skapa rätt förutsättningar för våra konsulter att må bra, utvecklas och leverera riktigt bra tillsammans.
   

  

**Vad du kommer göra**
 Du blir närmaste ledare för en grupp konsulter i Stockholm och jobbar coachande med fokus på utveckling, trivsel och prestation. En stor del av rollen handlar om att bygga teamkänsla och en kultur som känns både varm och vass, där vi levererar med hög kvalitet men också har kul längs vägen. Du följer upp hur det går i uppdragen, fångar tidigt upp behov och ser till att vi ligger steget före, både för konsulternas skull och för kundens.
   

  

 Du kommer även arbeta tätt ihop med sälj och leverans för att driva beläggning och uppdragsmatchning. Det betyder att du har koll på nuläget, men också aktivt jobbar med nästa steg, både för individen och för teamet. Och eftersom vi växer kommer du också vara en viktig del i rekryteringen, från kravprofil och intervjuer till att säkerställa en kandidatupplevelse som känns professionell, personlig och väldigt Redeploy.
   

  

**Vem vi tror att du är**
 Du är handlingskraftig, lösningsorienterad och gillar att ta ansvar. Du trivs nära verksamheten och har ett naturligt driv att få saker att hända, utan att tappa människoperspektivet. Du är trygg i dialogen med kund, tydlig i din kommunikation och bra på att skapa förtroende. Du tar beslut när det behövs och är samtidigt lyhörd nog att förstå vad som pågår under ytan.
   

  

**Det här tror vi att du har med dig**
* Erfarenhet av en ledar- eller chefsroll i en miljö med IT eller techkompetens (t.ex. konsultchef, team lead, delivery lead eller liknande)
* Erfarenhet av personalutveckling: coaching, mål och uppföljning, feedback och svåra samtal
* Förståelse för uppdrags- eller leveransverksamhet, där matchning, planering och kvalitet är viktiga delar
* Stark kommunikationsförmåga och vana att bygga förtroende hos både medarbetare och stakeholders
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Om du även har med dig detta ser vi det som ett stort plus!**
 Erfarenhet av att bygga team i en växande organisation, arbeta nära rekrytering eller en bakgrund som gör att du förstår vardagen för Cloud infra-konsulter, utan att själv behöva vara teknisk specialist. Har du dessutom arbetat datadrivet med frågor som retention, medarbetarupplevelse eller performance kommer du ha nytta av det i rollen
   

  

**Det här får du hos oss**
 Hos Redeploy får du möjlighet att påverka på riktigt. Här får du vara en del av ett högpresterande, hjälpsamt gäng som gillar att göra saker ordentligt. Lärande är en del av vardagen, genom certifieringar, utbildningar, events och kunskapsdelning. Vi jobbar hybrid, men ser gärna att våra ledare syns på kontoret en hel del, eftersom kultur och teamkänsla inte byggs via kalenderbokningar.
   

  

 Vi gör seriösa saker, men tar oss själva inte på för stort allvar. Och ja, det går att leverera med hög kvalitet och ändå ha kul. Vi har testat.
   

  

**Låter det här som du?** 
 Vi tar emot ansökningar via vår karriärsida enligt GDPR. Har du frågor om rollen är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Francisca Andersson, Talent Acquisition Manager.

title: Join our Customer Success Manager (Buy Side) Team!
description:
At Mercell, we're on a mission to revolutionize public procurement, making it accessible and effortless for everyone involved. Imagine a world where public buyers and visionary suppliers come together seamlessly to make a great deal easier and shape the future. That's what we're all about.
   

  

 With a dynamic culture built on continuous growth, trust, and collaboration, Mercell offers an environment where your talents can thrive. You will be part of an international environment with ambitious and dedicated colleagues who are passionate about what they do and supported to be themselves.
   

  

 Together, let's shape the future and create real value for society, one innovative solution at a time.
   

  

****Join Us****
 We are growing our Buy Side, Customer Success Manager teams and looking for ambitious Customer Success Managers to join us in several markets. This is not a single open role but an ongoing hiring pipeline, and we will continuously match strong profiles with upcoming opportunities across teams.
   

  

**Your Mission**
 As a Customer Success Manager, in the Buy Side team, you will be at the forefront of how Mercell partners with its public sector customers including universities, hospitals, municipalities, and other buyers.
   

  

 This role reflects the evolution of Customer Success at Mercell: moving closer to our customers, deeper into their reality, to being proactive on their needs and more focused on long-term value creation.
   

  

 You will be part of the Customer Success team and report to the Head of Customer Success. Beyond managing a portfolio of customers, you will act as a trusted advisor working proactively with customers to understand their procurement goals, guide them in using Mercell’s solutions effectively, and help them navigate complex public procurement challenges. Your focus will be on driving meaningful adoption, measurable outcomes, and strong, long-term partnerships that truly make a difference for our customers and society.
   

  

 This is a talent pool, and we will be reviewing applications on an ongoing basis if you’re passionate about customers, impact, and long-term partnerships, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**Core Responsibilities**
* Build and maintain strong, long-term relationships with a portfolio of buy side customers.
* Act as the main point of contact throughout the customer lifecycle from onboarding to renewal.
* Drive product adoption, ensuring customers achieve their desired outcomes with Mercell solutions.
* Proactively identify opportunities to enhance customer value, including risk mitigation and growth pathways.
* Collaborate with Sales, Product, Support, and other teams to ensure seamless customer experience and continuous improvement.
* Represent the Voice of the Customer internally, providing insights that influence product and service enhancements.


**Required Qualifications**
* Strong experience (ideally 3+ years) in customer success, account management, or a similar client-facing role within a SaaS environment.
* Experience working with public sector customers.
* Strong interpersonal and communication skills, capable of engaging with stakeholders at all levels.
* Demonstrated ability to manage multiple customer accounts efficiently and prioritize based on value and risk.
* Analytical and data-driven mindset with the ability to assess customer health and provide actionable recommendations.
* Familiarity with CRM/CS tools (i.e. Hubspot).
* Fluency (written and spoken) in English and at least in one of the following languages: Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Dutch, German, Finnish.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience working with public sector organizations, procurement processes, or complex multi-stakeholder environments.
* Experience in scaled customer engagement and retention strategies.


**Locations:** 
 Sweden, Denmark, Norway, Germany, Netherlands, UK, Finland
   

  

 Hybrid workplace (working onsite at the office and from home), balancing flexibility with collaboration.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 As a fast growing technology company, we are committed to taking care of our employees through initiatives such as hybrid work to support work-life balance, health and insurance plans (may differ per country/office), pension plans, paid parental leave, social happenings and competitive salary packages. Please see https://career.mercell.com/posts/our-perks-benefits to get more insights on what to expect of perks, benefits and culture when joining Mercell.
   

  

**Has this sparked your interest?**
 Apply now and join our team!
   

  

 This is a talent pool, there is no fixed application deadline — we will review applications continuously.
   

  

 By applying, your profile will be considered for upcoming opportunities that match your skills, experience, and interests. We will keep you updated accordingly throughout the process.
   

  

* Mercell is an equal opportunity employer. We welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds and experiences.
* Mercell handles all personal data in line with GDPR and our Privacy Policy.
* Mercell does not provide relocation support. We are seeking candidates who are already based in, or have existing work authorization for, the country where the role is located.
* Mercell may carry out background checks on applicants to verify information that appears on CVs and other documentation. This background check is carried out by an external party and is not carried out without the consent of the applicant. Current applicants will receive further information about this.

title: Senior Cloud Architect
description:
Ansök nu
   

  

* Urval sker löpande
* Stockholm
* Arbete på plats


 Arbetsuppgifter
   

  

**Är du arkitekten bakom nästa generations molnresa? (Var med och bygg vårt nya team)**
 Du är antagligen den vassaste personen i rummet där du sitter just nu. Du har sett tekniktrender komma och gå. Du vet inte bara
 *hur* 
 man sätter upp ett kluster, utan
 *varför* 
 man ska göra det. Det är bekvämt där du är. Men du saknar kanske mandatet att verkligen påverka "hur:et".
   

  

 Handen på hjärtat: Är du redo att bygga något eget?
   

  

 På Forefront satsar vi nu vidare. Vi bygger upp ett nytt specialistteam inom
 **GCP Infrastructure & App Modernization** 
 – och vi behöver någon som håller i rodret tekniskt. Vi söker dig som inte bara vill ta anställning, utan som vill vara med och
 **forma erbjudandet, kulturen och metodiken** 
 från grunden.
   

  

**Rollen: Strateg och teknisk ledare i teamet**
 Du kommer in i ett skede där allt är möjligt. Du får chansen att definiera "best practice" och bygga den miljö du alltid velat jobba i.
   

  

* Bygga teamet: Du är med och sätter tonen. Du agerar mentor och teknisk ledstjärna för de som ansluter till resan.
* Modernisering: Du designar arkitekturen för att bryta upp monoliter till mikrotjänster i GKE.
* Business + Tech: Du har den tekniska tyngden för att bygga skalbart, men också konsultmässigheten att förklara visionen för våra kunder.


 Kvalifikationer
   

  

**Din verktygslåda**
 För att leda den här satsningen krävs att du har 5+ års erfarenhet och en trygghet i din kompetens.
   

  

* Plattformen: Du är expert på GCP (sannolikt certifierad Architect).
* Hantverket: Du vet vad som krävs för att bygga moderna och robusta system. Du kan din IaC och säkerhetsarkitektur.
* Drivkraften: Du går igång på nybyggaranda. Du ser möjligheter där andra ser oordning och du vill sätta din prägel på verksamheten.


**Vad får du? (WIIFM)** 
 Varför ska du byta? För att få det bästa av två världar: Tryggheten i ett etablerat konsultbolag, men friheten och energin hos en startup. Du får mandat att påverka. Vill du bygga ett nytt erbjudande? Föreläsa? Forma morgondagens stjärnor? Scenen är din.
   

  

**Kaffe före CV?** 
 Ett CV visar din historia. Vi är intresserade av din vision för framtiden. Är du redo att vara med och bygga från start?
   

  

 Känner du igen dig i Framåtrörelsen? Låt oss ta en kaffe (eller Teams) och se om våra visioner matchar. Ansök nu!

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**Description & Requirements**
 Electronic Arts creates next-level entertainment experiences that inspire players and fans around the world. Here, everyone is part of the story. Part of a community that connects across the globe. A place where creativity thrives, new perspectives are invited, and ideas matter. A team where everyone makes play happen.
   

  

 Do you want to be part of the team behind the world's most accurate optical tracking system for football? At TRACAB, we develop real-time solutions that have been used in some of the world's biggest events, such as the FIFA World Cup, as well as by top football leagues including Bundesliga, LaLiga and MLS. Every match day, our technology transforms how fans, analysts, and teams experience the game.
   

  

 We are looking for a Machine Learning Developer who is passionate about creating real products and thrives in a dedicated and close-knit team. If you're excited by cutting-edge technology and want to shape the future of sports analytics, this is the role for you!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Keep abreast with the latest developments in machine learning and AI and apply these techniques to real world problems in the sports domain.
* Analyse the performance of machine learning modules, prepare and manage data, deploy machine learning systems in a Cloud environment.
* Collaborate with the team to continuously improve our real-time tracking system, used live during matches.


**Requirements**
* A Master's degree in Machine Learning or equivalent academic or industrial experience.
* Experience working with deep learning models, and knowledge of other machine learning techniques.
* Knowledge of Python and experience with PyTorch and/or Tensorflow.
* Experience working with Computer Vision and/or Machine Learning on images/video.


**Nice to have**
* Experience with C++
* Experience working with sports video and/or data.


**Why Join TRACAB?**
 At TRACAB, you'll work on technology that directly impacts professional sports at the highest level. Join a passionate team focused on innovation, where you'll play a central role in creating cutting-edge solutions that redefine live sports analytics.
   

  

 Ready to Make a Difference? Apply today and become part of TRACAB's journey to revolutionize sports technology. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

**About Electronic Arts**
 We’re proud to have an extensive portfolio of games and experiences, locations around the world, and opportunities across EA. We value adaptability, resilience, creativity, and curiosity. From leadership that brings out your potential, to creating space for learning and experimenting, we empower you to do great work and pursue opportunities for growth.
   

  

 We adopt a holistic approach to our benefits programs, emphasizing physical, emotional, financial, career, and community wellness to support a balanced life. Our packages are tailored to meet local needs and may include healthcare coverage, mental well-being support, retirement savings, paid time off, family leaves, complimentary games, and more. We nurture environments where our teams can always bring their best to what they do.
   

  

 Electronic Arts is an equal opportunity employer. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We will also consider employment qualified applicants with criminal records in accordance with applicable law. EA also makes workplace accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities as required by applicable law.

title: Application Maintenance Engineer
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.
   

  

 Your role
   

  

 As an
 **Application Maintenance Engineer** 
 you will be part of a team responsible for maintaining and supporting applications, ensuring stability and performance. The role involves incident resolution, change implementation, automation, and monitoring across technologies such as Java, JavaScript, Perl, Unix shell scripting, and containerised environments.
   

  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*
* Maintain and support applications, ensuring availability and adherence to SLAs.
* Troubleshoot and resolve incidents; perform root cause analysis and implement fixes. Automate routine maintenance tasks using scripts and tools.
* Apply changes and releases safely across Unix/Linux environments.
* Set up monitoring and dashboards for proactive issue detection. Participate in extended hours/on call support rotation when required.


**Your profile**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or related field.
* 5+ years of experience in application maintenance or production support.
* Strong skills in Java, Perl, and Unix/Linux scripting. Working knowledge of JavaScript for minor fixes or enhancements.
* Exposure to monitoring tools (e.g., Grafana) and log analysis. Understanding of ITIL processes (Incident, Problem, Change). Familiarity with Docker and container basics.
* Fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.


***As part of our recruitment process, identity verification will be conducted through inspection of your ID card, and background checks may be carried out as required.***
  

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Backend Engineer
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we’re looking for a passionate Backend Engineer to join our Native E-commerce team in Stockholm. In this role, you’ll take on meaningful technical challenges and work closely with cross-functional teams to build products that empower millions of merchants worldwide. If this sounds exciting, read on — the best is yet to come!
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Essential Responsibilities:**
* Delivers complete solutions spanning all phases of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) (design, implementation, testing, delivery and operations), based on definitions from more senior roles.
* Advises immediate management on project-level issues
* Guides junior engineers
* Operates with little day-to-day supervision, making technical decisions based on knowledge of internal conventions and industry best practices
* Applies knowledge of technical best practices in making decisions


**Expected Qualifications:**
* 3+ years relevant experience and a Bachelor’s degree OR Any equivalent combination of education and experience.


**Additional Responsibilities And Preferred Qualifications**
**Meet our Team**
 The Native E-commerce team is building the foundation for a new way to sell online. Our mission is to make it effortless for micro-merchants and small businesses to launch and grow their online stores. We’re combining conversational AI for intuitive store setup, flexible backend services, and seamless PayPal payments to help anyone start selling in minutes and scale as they grow. This role is an unique opportunity for your to contribute in shaping the future of commerce.
   

  

**Your day-to-day**
 As a Backend Engineer, you’ll contribute to designing and delivering high-quality solutions while learning from and collaborating closely with your team. Your day-to-day will include:
   

  

* Developing and implementing solutions with growing ownership and confidence.
* Making thoughtful technical decisions and seeking feedback or guidance when needed.
* Balancing trade-offs in system design, scalability, and performance.
* Breaking down complex problems, asking the right questions, and helping to shape practical solutions.
* Contributing to team discussions, sharing ideas, and helping improve how the team builds and delivers software.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Solid experience with RESTful API development and microservice architecture.
* Hands-on work with Java and familiarity with testing frameworks and practices.
* Understanding of system design fundamentals and production-grade backend systems.


**Get bonus points if you also have...**
* Experience with Kotlin and deploying to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, or similar).
* Exposure to containerization (Docker) and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform).
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Grafana or Datadog.
* Understanding or experience with event-driven architecture or message-based systems.


**We Believe in You**
 Interested in knowing more? Don't hesitate to apply and/or let's talk – we'd love to get to know you!
   

  

 \_
   

  

 PayPal does not charge candidates any fees for courses, applications, resume reviews, interviews, background checks, or onboarding. Any such request is a red flag and likely part of a scam. To learn more about how to identify and avoid recruitment fraud please visit https://careers.pypl.com/contact-us.
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset-you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.

title: Data & AI Practice Lead - Sweden
description:
**Summary**
 The Sweden Data & Artificial Intelligence Practice Lead is responsible for driving the practices growth and solidifying Avanade’s position as a leading strategic partner. Reporting to the Regional Practices Lead and aligning with the global practice, this role ensures Azure Data, Analytics services and Artificial Intelligence technical solution excellence and delivery integrity. The Sweden Data & Artificial Intelligence Lead will oversee technical execution, cultivate team skills in current and emerging Microsoft technologies, and implement a comprehensive talent strategy to support business needs.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Implement the global Data & Artificial Intelligence practices strategy within the region. Set and communicate regional practice priorities.
* Lead region practices in line with agreed plans and KPIs.
* Provide feedback loop upwards to drive continuous improvement.
* Identify opportunities for inorganic growth. Own and extend client relationships, becoming a client advisor with tangible contributions to the region and clients, helping broaden the regions’ client network, identify opportunities for growth, and deliver an exceptional client experience.
* Strategic Relationships and Innovation
* Cultivate and sustain a close working relationship with local Microsoft Product Engineering Groups and relevant Accenture leaders; and with on-, near, and offshore delivery centers positioning us as the partner of choice and important source of product feature feedback.
* Establish and maintain close relationships with key regional ecosystem partners to facilitate collaboration in solutioning and delivery.
* Stay informed of client feedback, emerging trends, and innovations, providing ideas to global for new opportunities for practice-relevant solutions to maintain competitive edge. Foster and incubate innovations locally. Help establish and support innovative strategies to lower our cost to serve based on market demands.
* Collaborate with region client teams to customize GTM motions and develop technical solutions for clients. Harvest best-in-class local solutioning assets and best practices and provide to global.
* Hold local accountability for shaping practice-specific technical solutions, providing oversight on all deals to maintain solution integrity. Address delivery quality escalations and ensure delivery best practices are being solutioned and delivered. Provide thought leadership relevant to the practice, enhancing our impact in the market.
* Ensure the regional practice has sufficient capacity to support client teams from pre-sales assets, to solutioning, to delivery of practice-related solutions.
* Contribute to and execute the global growth program within the practice for critical skills, including certifications, to keep employees in all sourcing options (on-, near-, & offshore) at the forefront of current and emerging Microsoft technologies. Leverage global job families, skills, & project roles to deliver consistent practice solutions.
* In alignment with the global practice and region client teams, define a holistic regional talent that includes skills, headcount, and location across all sourcing options to meet client demand, support the I&D agenda, and develop a future-ready workforce.
* Own accountability for regional practice market utilization and chargeability, ensuring targets are met or exceeded. Collaborate to address any staffing challenges that arise.
* Execute local programs to drive employee engagement, retention, and well-being, cultivating a highly skilled and motivated workforce within the regional practice.
* Communicate career pathways, support leadership development, and own succession planning for the regional practice. Drive employees to broaden of skills, secure promotions, and encourage experience in diverse roles. Own talent and performance management processes for assigned practice members. Includes accountability for leading Talent Discussions, understanding talent pipeline, and making pay and promotion decisions in collaboration with HR to ensure consistent standards and reward structures are used.


**Qualifications**
**Skills and experiences**
* Proven experience leading teams at the regional level, with a focus on delivering results, growing skills, fostering culture, and EVP.
* Strong understanding of Analytics Services, Azure Data and AI, ensuring technical excellence and solution integrity across the region.
* Ability to build and maintain strong client relationships, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions that meet regional client needs.
* Experience working within a matrix, aligning regional goals with global strategies while addressing local market needs.
* Demonstrated ability to capitalize on growth opportunities, ensuring the practice remains competitive and responsive to market trends.
* Strong delivery skills and experience delivering complex projects.
* Significant relevant consulting experience designing, selling, and leading client engagements with Azure Data Solutions, Artificial Intelligence adoption and integration, containerization techniques and automation deployment.


**Characteristics That Demonstrate Success For This Role**
* Mature decision maker, strong leade.
* Master negotiator and relationship builder.
* Able to see, evaluate and master unique skillset in each practice member
* Act as a brick wall between business and client teams
* Great communicator of priorities and expectations.

title: Senior AI Engineer
description:
**Senior AI Engineer role - Established product company - Stockholm 💡** 




  





 I'm working in collaboration with a well-established product company in Stockholm, who are disrupting and transforming a typically corporate, enterprise financial sector with a digital-first, user-focused web & mobile apps!
 



  





 With over 100 people in the company, 130,000 active paying customers across Sweden, they are a super stable organisation with an established product and a strong reputation. They combine a customer-first approach and cutting-edge technology to streamline, simplify and optimize everything related to insurance!
 



  





 Key features of the product and how they differ:
 



  




* Fully digital claims: Upload a voice memo, or a photo via their app - and quickly get guided through the full claims process by their team
* Tailored user experience based on your insurance needs, products etc
* Customers can cancel any time
* **Focus on AI & automation when it comes to quotes, pricing, claims - and therefore are focused on accelerating their AI strategy in 2026 to build and deploy production-grade, AI features and tools for genuine impact!**



  





**Role:** 




  





 With a tonne of new feature development ahead, and a focus on leveraging and deploying AI , they are
 **looking for a Senior software engineer with experience building and deploying AI-based tools and products, to play a pivotal role in the next phase of the company and drive their AI strategy and engineering!** 




  





 This is a product-focused engineering role rather than a purely research-driven position. The majority of your time will be spent building features, designing scalable systems, and improving the overall product experience, whilst collaborating with different product teams, senior leadership and business stakeholders to drive AI product development!
 



  





 In addition, you will contribute to AI-related initiatives by evaluating technical approaches, exploring new applications, and helping ensure AI technologies are used thoughtfully, responsibly, and effectively within the product.
 



  





 You will work within a modern, cloud-based technology environment that includes back-end services, web applications, native mobile applications, API-driven communication, and distributed systems architecture.
 



  





**You do not need deep expertise in every technology used, but you should be comfortable navigating complex systems and learning new tools and frameworks as needed.** 




  





 👋✅
 **you will:** 




  




* Design and implement high-quality product features across backend, web, and mobile platforms
* Contribute to system architecture and technical decision-making
* Improve scalability, reliability, and maintainability of distributed systems
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate product ideas into production-ready solutions
* Support the evaluation and integration of AI capabilities within the product
* Help define best practices for responsible and effective use of AI technologies



  





 🛠️💡
 **Responsibilities** 




  




* Develop and maintain backend services within a microservices architecture
* Build and enhance web and mobile application features
* Contribute to API design and system integration
* Participate in architectural discussions and technical planning
* Explore and evaluate AI/LLM-powered solutions for real-world product use cases
* Integrate AI model APIs and design prompt-driven or automation-based features where appropriate
* Contribute to testing, evaluation, and quality assurance of AI-enabled functionality
* Write clean, maintainable, well-tested code



  





 💡💻
 **Requirements (and nice to haves!)** 




  




* 4+ years of professional experience as a software engineer
* Strong computer science fundamentals and practical system design skills
* Experience delivering high-quality production software
* Experience working with AI or LLM-powered features in real-world projects (e.g., model integrations, prompt-based workflows, automation, evaluation systems)
* Ability to navigate ambiguity and explore AI opportunities pragmatically without over-engineering
* Comfort working in modern cloud-based, distributed systems environments
* Strong collaboration and communication skills
* Customer-focused mindset with an interest in building purposeful, impactful technology
* Motivation to contribute to a culture of learning, feedback, and continuous improvement



  





 This is a permanent role in Stockholm, working on a hybrid model. Super impactful role with a tonne of autonomy and ownership, whilst being part of a warm and collaborative engineering organisation!

title: Data Analyst / Power BI Specialist
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Your Profile (Must-have Requirements)**
* 3-5 years of experience in product analytics
* Experience of project management of PowerBI projects
* Excellent statistical, analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent verbal, visual and written communication skills
* Proficient with SQL, bonus if familiar with PySpark (Databricks)
* Proficient with statistical attribution techniques


**Meritorious**
* Experience with guiding the work of a team
* Experience in analytics within gaming industry
* Passion for gaming and entertainment


**Application deadline:** 
 19-02-2026
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Principal Product Manager - AI/LLM
description:
**About Neko Health**
 Neko Health is a Swedish healthcare technology company co-founded in 2018 by Hjalmar Nilsonne and Daniel Ek. Neko's vision is to shift healthcare from reactive treatment toward preventative health and early detection. This requires completely reimagining the patient's experience and incorporating the latest advances in sensors and AI. Neko Health has developed a new medical scanning technology concept to make it possible to do broad and non-invasive health data collection that is convenient and affordable for the public. The company is based in Stockholm, offering the Neko Body Scan experience at locations in Stockholm, London and Manchester, with over 500 employees.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As Principal PM for AI and LLM, you will lead the product vision for building the world’s #1 consumer interface for health. You will build LLM experiences that outperform foundational models in medical advice, and you will create superhuman diagnostics for members and doctors.
   

  

 You will ship AI products end to end including LLM chat interfaces, medical reasoning and diagnostic features, member summaries, doctor pre-briefs, and workflow automation. You will work closely with engineering, design, medical, and data science to turn complex signals into simple and intuitive experiences.
   

  

 You will define the 10X opportunities and set the quality bar for intelligence at Neko for 20+ products across software and hardware, all designed to work as one experience.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Define and drive how AI and LLM power Neko’s products and experiences
* Build LLM chat, medical reasoning, and diagnostic features that feel simple, safe, and clinically trustworthy
* Create clear, human centered summaries and pre-briefs that help members understand their health and help doctors work faster
* Lead the development of workflow automation that reduces clinical workload and improves care quality
* Turn complex medical and sensor data into intuitive products with high taste, clarity, and attention to detail
* Collaborate closely with engineering, design, medical, and data science teams to ship high quality features at high velocity
* Identify and prioritize the opportunities that have the greatest impact on members and clinicians
* Use insights from members, doctors, clinics, and data science to guide product decisions
* Ensure the safe deployment of AI features and partner with medical and regulatory teams to meet high standards
* Set and maintain the quality bar for intelligence across all Neko products


**Requirements**
* 10+ years of product management experience, including deep work with AI, ML, or LLM powered products
* Strong product taste and the ability to turn complex technical systems into simple and intuitive experiences
* Thrive in high ambiguity and high impact environments
* Collaborate and build trust with engineering, design, medical, and data science teams to drive complex initiatives end to end
* Communicate and align teams around a shared vision
* Motivated by Neko’s mission to transform healthcare from reactive to proactive


**Why join Neko?**
* Rapidly scaling Series B company
* Backed by $250M in our latest funding round
* Join a mission-driven team improving preventative healthcare
* Work in a tech-first, product-driven environment


 We offer a dynamic work environment with a high degree of autonomy that fosters growth and development. If you are passionate about building a better healthcare system for everyone and you thrive in a fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you!
   

  

*Please note: we perform background and reference checks as part of our interview process.*

title: Sales Director / Wibe Group / Stockholm
description:
***Vi söker en Global Sales Director som vill ta ett helhetsansvar för Wibe Groups kommersiella utveckling och internationella tillväxtresa.***
***Wibe Group***
*grundades 1929 och har i nära 100 år drivit innovation och utveckling. Med rötterna i den ikoniska hexagonstegen och ett starkt fokus på hållbarhet skapar vi smarta lösningar tillsammans med våra kunder. Genom entreprenörskap, samarbete och människors utveckling skapar vi stolthet – idag och för framtida generationer.*
 OM ROLLEN
   

  

**Som Sales Director** 
 har du det övergripande ansvaret för Wibe Groups globala försäljning. Du rapporterar till CEO Paul-Henri Geisler och ingår i koncernens ledningsgrupp. Wibe Groups huvudkontor är i Mora och vi ser gärna att du utgår från Stockholm eller Göteborg.
   

  

 Rollen kombinerar strategiskt ansvar med ett starkt operativt och närvarande ledarskap. Du är aktiv i marknaden, arbetar nära kunder och leder samt coachar Country Managers i vardagen. Du tar ett tydligt kommersiellt ägarskap och driver försäljningen mot uppsatta mål genom riktning, struktur och engagemang.
   

  

 Du leder genom ett närvarande ledarskap, tydlighet och systematisk uppföljning med stöd av KPI:er, CRM och en kommersiell styrning. Arbetet präglas av analys, prioritering och kontinuerlig förbättring på lokal såväl som global nivå.
   

  

 Du leder en internationell kommersiell ledningsgrupp bestående av Country Managers för Sverige, Norge, Danmark, UK och Nederländerna samt centrala funktioner såsom Inside Sales och Market Development. Tillsammans sätter och genomför ni den kommersiella agendan för koncernen.
   

  

 DIN PROFIL
   

  

 Vi söker en senior, trygg och närvarande ledare som är lika bekväm i strategiarbete som ute hos kund. Du är coachande, strukturerad och tydlig, med ett genuint intresse för affären och för människorna som driver den.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att Du har dokumenterad erfarenhet av att leda ledare i internationella eller multinationella organisationer. Du har drivit försäljningsutveckling i komplexa B2B-miljöer och arbetar naturligt med mål, uppföljning och kommersiell styrning. Det är starkt meriterande om du kommer från elektronikbranschen alternativt närliggande bransch, med god förståelse och vana från vår affärslogik som till stor del bedrivs via återförsäljare.
   

  

 Du ser möjligheter samt arbetar syftesdrivet och engagerat för att nå uppsatta mål, med förmåga att kombinera vision med genomförandekraft. Som person är du ambitiös och ansvarstagande med hög integritet. Du bygger förtroende genom närvaro, tydlighet och ett ödmjukt ledarskap, samt skapar förutsättningar och engagemang genom att ge riktning, mandat och stöd.
   

  

 DIN ANSÖKAN
   

  

 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Wibe Group med Wise Sales (fd SalesOnly) och rekryteringskonsult Kajsa Sandén. Vid frågor kring tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Kajsa på sms/tel 0735-21 65 31 eller via mejl: kajsa.sanden@wise.se. Alla ansökningar och kontakter behandlas konfidentiellt. Urval sker löpande och intervjuer genomförs under vecka 4–6.
 **Varmt välkommen med din ansökan!**
**OM WIBE** 
 G
 **ROUP**
***Wibe Group***

*är ett snabbt växande internationellt företag med fabriker i Sverige, Nederländerna, Malaysia och Indien samt säljkontor i Norge, Danmark och Storbritannien. Vi är cirka 430 medarbetare globalt och har vårt huvudkontor i Mora.*
*Wibelieve in you – vår kultur och våra värderingar
   

  

 På Wibe Group tror vi att människor är nyckeln till vår framgång. Fantastiska saker händer när människor känner sig betrodda, stärkta och inspirerade. Din utveckling, dina idéer och din passion formar framtiden tillsammans med oss.*
*Våra värderingar genomsyrar allt vi gör: Truly value people, Be consistent, Foster growth och Create unity.*

title: Information Security Officer
description:
Blykalla is scaling quickly in order to industrialize our small modular reactor (SMR) concept. If you are passionate about nuclear technology and want to make a significant impact, join us!
 



  





 Blykalla is building advanced nuclear technology, and that requires information and cyber security that works in practice. We are now looking for an Information Security Officer who will take responsibility for how information security is shaped, implemented, and used across the organisation.
 



  





 The role sits with the COO in the Operational Excellence team and focuses on cyber security, the digital workspace, collaboration tools, cloud environments, and product-related information flows. The task is to ensure that information security enables efficient work while meeting export control, regulatory, and national security requirements.
 



  





**What we do at Blykalla** 




  





*Blykalla is developing the next generation of nuclear technology with our Small Modular Reactor (SMR) based on innovative fuel, materials, and reactor designs. As Sweden’s only SMR developer, we are on a mission to decarbonize industries and enable safe, scalable, and sustainable energy solutions. Our technology uses uranium nitride fuel and lead coolant, creating novel challenges and opportunities for the fuel cycle and supporting systems.* 




  





**What you’ll get to do** 




  





**Set and improve information and cyber security in daily operations** 




  




* Take overall responsibility for how information security is implemented across our digital workspace and product-related information, with a strong focus on cyber security in practice.
* Stay closely connected to systems and workflows to understand practical constraints and risks, while working through IT and engineering teams for implementation.
* Maintain and evolve the organisation’s information security and privacy framework so that it reflects operational reality and fulfil regulatory requirements and business needs.



  





**Translate regulatory and export control requirements into workable security** 




  




* Turn export control, data protection, and other regulatory requirements into clear, actionable security rules and technical guardrails for everyday work.
* Ensure compliance with applicable Swedish and EU regulations, including the Network and Information Security Directive (NIS2), through practical and proportionate measures.
* Prepare for and support external audits, regulatory reviews, and assurance activities related to information security standards.



  





**Own security risk, incidents, and resilience** 




  




* Maintain the organisation’s view of information security risk, defining acceptable risk levels, mitigation needs, and escalation paths.
* Lead preparedness for and response to information security incidents, including coordination, regulatory interaction where required, and follow-up actions.
* Drive continuous improvements in security posture and resilience based on incidents, assessments, and changes in the threat landscape.



  





**Coordinate security across teams, products, and external providers** 




  




* Act as the main coordination point for information security across engineering, operations, legal, and management.
* Set direction for security aspects related to products, platforms, and supporting infrastructure, including PLM, secure development practices, vulnerability handling, and information security across the product lifecycle.
* Work with external digital and cloud service providers on security requirements, incidents, and follow-up to ensure external dependencies remain controlled and fit for purpose.



  





**Who you are** 




  





 This role suits someone who combines sound judgement with a practical, hands-on understanding of cyber and information security. You are comfortable setting direction and making decisions, but you also enjoy working close to systems and people to ensure that security measures actually work in practice. You understand the need to balance security, regulatory compliance, and operational efficiency in a growing organisation.
 



  





**Qualifications** 




  




* Practical experience working with information and cyber security in regulated or security-sensitive environments.
* A technical background in IT, cloud infrastructure, or secure system
* Experience implementing security controls and ways of working, not just defining policies and frameworks.
* Familiarity with regulatory and assurance-driven environments, including export control, data protection, or critical infrastructure regulation.
* Experience collaborating with engineering teams, IT, legal functions, and external service providers.
* Fluency in English; Swedish is an advantage.
* Eligibility to work with sensitive and controlled information in Sweden.



  





**Location** 




  





 This position is for our office in Stockholm.

title: Fullstack IoT Engineer
description:
**About Echandia Marine**
 Echandia Marine is a leading innovator in sustainable marine battery systems, providing cutting-edge technology to enable cleaner, more efficient marine transport. Our mission is to revolutionize the maritime industry through advanced battery technology, improving efficiency and reducing environmental impact.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Fullstack IoT Engineer to join our growing software team. In this role, you will design and build scalable, high-performance applications that connect embedded systems, cloud infrastructure, and user interfaces. Your work will directly support the monitoring, diagnostics, and control of our marine battery systems and at the same time support our developing efforts in cloud with both frontend and backend work.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design and implement software for battery management system based on maritime standards
* Build robust APIs and backend services to interface with embedded systems and cloud platforms in a Linux environment.
* Develop intuitive and responsive front-end interfaces for internal tools and customer-facing dashboards.
* Collaborate with embedded, test, and systems engineers to ensure seamless integration across the stack.
* Implement secure, scalable, and maintainable software architectures.
* Contribute to DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and automated testing.
* Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and technical mentoring.


**Required Skills**
* Strong experience in fullstack development using modern frameworks, preferably Angular, Typescript and C#.
* Proficiency in designing RESTful APIs and working with IoT Solutions.
* Experience in developing hardware-near applications
* Solid understanding of software architecture and cyber security.
* Familiarity with data visualization, telemetry, and system monitoring tools.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.


**Bonus**
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, and GCP, and with containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes.
* Experience with Agile development methodologies.
* Experience developing embedded applications using C.
* Experience with Linux systems administration.
* Experience with CI/CD and build automation using GitHub Actions.
* Familiarity with databases (SQL and NoSQL) and message brokers such as MQTT and Kafka.
* Knowledge of maritime compliance standards.


 Echandia is challenging the maritime industry with safer electrification. Since its founding in 2018, Echandia has rapidly become a global leader in maritime battery systems, delivering nearly 70 systems for electrification projects worldwide. Our systems are tailored to optimize energy efficiency and reduce environmental impact, supporting the maritime industry’s transition towards sustainable operations. Based in Stockholm, we serve customers across the globe.

title: Product Manager - Telecom
description:
The world is changing in the way we consume products, from ownership to usership, and DigitalRoute is positioned in the centre of the transition. Because, when enterprises pivot to usage-based business models, they often make an unfortunate discovery. Their systems weren’t built to handle the massive data volumes and complexity that usage-based models generate. This causes them to leak revenue and respond too slowly to customer demand. DigitalRoute solves this by creating a real-time usage data layer for enterprises. Our products transform raw usage data into clear information for billing, in real time and at high scale.
 



  





 DigitalRoute is strengthening its focus on telecom and looking for a senior Product Manager to own and grow our telco business. You’ll report to the CPO, sit in the core Product Management team, and be the clear commercial and product owner for the telecom segment.
 



  





 Your mandate: turn our strong position in BSS/OSS data and the shift to cloud and AI into ARR.
 



  





**What You'll Do** 



* Set and own the telco product vision together with the CPO, and turn it into a focused roadmap and clear investment priorities.
* Turn trends in cloud, AI, automation and real-time intelligence in BSS/OSS into concrete product capabilities and use cases.
* Define and evolve the value proposition, positioning and messaging for our telco cloud and AI-enabled offerings.
* Make sure Sales, Marketing, Product and Customer Success are aligned on the same story and use it in the field.
* Own packaging and pricing for the telco portfolio, including consumption-based and cloud models.
* Partner with Sales and Customer Success to drive migrations from on-premise to cloud and increase adoption and usage.
* Lead advanced technical and architectural discussions with telco customers and partners on cloud transformation, data architectures and AI-driven capabilities.
* Represent DigitalRoute externally in customer meetings, industry events, webinars and online forums.



  





**What You'll Bring** 



* 10+ years in B2B software, with significant product management experience in the telecom space (CSPs/operators, BSS/OSS, charging/billing/mediation).
* Strong telecom domain knowledge and deep familiarity with BSS/OSS architectures, processes and data flows.
* Hands-on experience with cloud-based offerings or cloud migrations in enterprise or telco environments.
* Proven track record of defining and communicating a product vision and turning it into a roadmap with clear commercial impact.
* Experience working closely with Sales and Customer Success on go-to-market, migrations and adoption.
* Comfortable and credible in customer-facing work, including senior stakeholder meetings, industry events and webinars.



  





**And In How You Work, You** 



* Explain complex telco and technical topics in a simple, clear way.
* Collaborate well across Product, Sales, Marketing, Customer Success and Engineering and help align them.
* Are customer-focused and curious, and turn insights into concrete product decisions.
* Are both strategic and hands-on happy to set direction and dive into details.
* Use data to guide decisions and stay close to business outcomes.
* Handle ambiguity well and bring structure and momentum when things move fast.



  





 Interested?
 



  





**Apply With Your CV And a Short Note On** 



* How you’ve driven ARR or commercial impact in a telco product role.
* A concrete example where you turned cloud or AI shifts in telecom into a product or use case that landed with customers.



  





 We follow a continuous selection process, and the position may be filled before the last application date.
 



  





 DigitalRoute is committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse environment, and we actively encourage qualified candidates of all genders, sexual orientations, ethnicities, disabilities, and ages to apply. Join our global and diverse company, where our differences are our strengths.

title: Solution Architect till Mission Critical
description:
Telia Cygate befinner sig i en spännande tillväxt- och förändringsresa! Mitt namn är Fredrik Gidlund och jag arbetar som Affärsområdesansvarig för vårt satsningsområde inom Mission Critical.
   

  

 Vi söker nu en Solution Architect som vill utveckla våra kunders förmågor främst inom totalförsvaret kopplat till våra lösningar och tjänster inom Nätverk, Säkerhet och Suveräna datacenterlösningar. Vi söker dig som vill arbeta som rådgivare internt och mot våra kunder samt arbeta i affärsgränssnittet mellan verksamheten och tekniken, där du omsätter kundens utmaningar till värdefulla lösningar!
   

  

**Vad du kommer göra i rollen:**
 Som Solution Architect inom Mission Critical agerar som rådgivare och
   

  

 förespråkare för vår förflyttning inom IT-infrastruktur kopplat till kunder inom totalförsvaret. Du kommer vara med att utveckla vår strategi inom våra tre områden Nätverk, Säkerhet & Suveräna datacenterlösningar, med fokus på områdesbevakning, intäktsutveckling och förbättringsaktiviteter.
   

  

 I rollen tar du även fram High Level Design, funktionsbeskrivning och produktval vid komplexa affärer och stöttar både konsultchefer, konsulter, säljare och kunder med planering och genomförandet av workshops. Många affärer sträcker sig idag över flera av våra lösningsområden så det är viktigt med en bred förståelse för helheten.
   

  

 Vidare kommer du att:
   

  

* Agera senior rådgivare och arkitekt inom avancerad IT-infrastruktur mot våra kunder inom totalförsvaret.
* Ansvara för framtagande av lösningsdesign, funktionsbeskrivning och produktval.
* Teknisk rådgivare och en viktig del av utvecklingen inom området Mission Critical.
* Utveckla och planera taktik och strategi utefter marknadens behov och efterfrågan av IT-infrastruktur.
* Arbeta nära och främst med våra kunder, strategiska partners, konsultchefer och sälj.
* Genomdriva och utveckla kund-workshops samt governanceramverk för att ”guida” våra kunder inom IT-infrastruktur.


**För att lyckas i rollen:**
 För att lyckas i rollen har du en djup förståelse av IT-infrastruktur, med koppling till affär och sälj. Du har en tidigare arbetat med rådgivning och design inom IT-infrastruktur på en hög nivå, och är van vid att driva ditt arbete både självständigt och i team med andra. Som person är du en skicklig kommunikatör, och är trygg i dialogen med människor på alla nivåer av en organisation. Du använder din omvärldskunskap för att adressera kunders behov.
   

  

* Bakgrund från liknande roller som arkitekt, konsult, presale inom IT-infrastruktur.
* Goda kunskaper inom IT-lösningar, både produkter och tjänster.
* Erfarenhet av att designa IT-lösningar från tillverkare såsom Cisco, Aruba, Juniper, HPE, Check Point & Fortinet.
* Meriterande är om du erhåller Certifieringar kopplat till olika tillverkare såsom Cisco CCIE, CCNP & Fortinet FCX, Aruba ACX & Check Point CCSM.
* Flytande kunskaper i svenska och engelska.


**Varför Telia Cygate?**
 På Telia Cygate är vi inte bara experter på nätverk, säkerhet och olika slags moln – vi är också ett gäng som tycker att det ska vara kul att gå till jobbet! Som en del av Telia Company har vi styrkan att skapa verklig påverkan i stor skala, bidra till samhällsnytta och hjälpa våra kunder att navigera i digitaliseringens värld. Vi gör det alltid med värme, omtanke och ett leende. Här är det idéerna och våra olika perspektiv som gör oss starka, och tillsammans ser vi till att teknikens värld blir en plats där alla trivs – och där du hör hemma.
   

  

 Hos oss är din utveckling viktig. Vi uppmuntrar till kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling och ser till att just du och dina intressen är i fokus. Vi vet att det är människorna som utgör vårt företag, och därför värdesätter vi glädje, kreativitet och olika perspektiv i allt vi gör.
   

  

 Välkommen att växa tillsammans med oss, där vi gör teknik mänsklig och skapar verklig
   

  

 påverkan
 **!**
**Vad vi erbjuder**
 När du börjar hos oss får du ett omfattande förmånspaket anpassat efter din lokala marknad, möjlighet till hybridarbete och mer. Du har också chans att få bonus baserat på din prestation och Telias resultat.
   

  

**Låter det intressant?**
 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan senast
 **2026-02-28.** 
 Rollen kan komma att stängas tidigare om vi hittar rätt kandidat – så vänta inte för länge!
   

  

 Placeringsort: Solna, Karlstad eller Göteborg
   

  

 Tjänsten omfattas av en del resor och övernattningar främst inom Sverige och körkort samt svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav. Bakgrundskontroller och säkerhetsprövningar ingår i rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Om du går vidare i processen kommer du att kontaktas av vår
 **Talent Acquisition Partner** 
 . Bakgrund- och referenskontroller ingår i processen.
   

  

 Vill du veta mer om rollen? Kontakta gärna Fredrik Gidlund på fredrik.gidlund@cygate.se.
   

  

**Lika möjligheter för alla**
 På Telia värderar vi kompetens och utvecklingspotential. Vi främjar mångfald och ser till att varje individs behov tillgodoses, oavsett funktionsvariation, kön, ålder, nationalitet, sexuell läggning eller social bakgrund. Tillsammans skapar vi en inkluderande arbetsmiljö där din unikhet är vår styrka.
   

  

**Välkommen till Telia Cygate – Home of Experts**

title: Junior Linux Kernel Engineer - Ubuntu
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation, and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1200+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office-based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder-led, profitable, and growing.
   

  

 Every year we select new junior professionals into the Canonical Kernel Team, to work on the Linux kernel for Ubuntu. If you've enjoyed operating systems in your coursework or current role, you are confident in your ability to write high quality C and possibly Rust, and are ready to take the plunge and see how it all works, then this would be a great place to pursue your next career stage. We are a global team working to ship the world's most widely used Linux kernel, across the very latest silicon and cloud, where you can apply and grow your software engineering skills.
   

  

 The Canonical Kernel Team builds and maintains all supported Ubuntu Linux kernels for a variety of platforms and architectures from small embedded devices to standard desktop/server systems to large-scale cloud environments. In your first year you will tackle serious initiatives, which include but are not limited to:
   

  

* Optimized solutions for key Silicon and Cloud partner platforms
* Developer platforms such as Raspberry Pi and RISC-V
* Enabling Ubuntu on a wide range of embedded systems
* Security hardening and exploit mitigation
* Third-party driver integration and distribution, such as graphics
* Expanded driver support for bleeding-edge PC platforms


 We select candidates that are recent university graduates or early career professionals who are enthusiastic to develop kernel-level software in multiple areas including security updates, patching, and testing. The successful candidate will have a background in software engineering, be motivated to work in a distributed team and willing and able to travel globally twice a year for company engineering events.
   

  

 These are full-time positions available to prospective or recently graduated students.
   

  

**Location:** 
 We have home-based Kernel Teams in every timezone.
   

  

**The role entails**
* Collaborate regularly and proactively with a globally distributed team
* Learn from senior mentors to demystify the inner workings of the Linux kernel and how it is distributed
* Work closely with external silicon, cloud, or hardware manufacturer delivery teams on bleeding-edge platforms
* Diagnose and resolve issues in the kernel reported by customers, the community, and discovered by your own rigorous testing
* Take personal responsibility for the delivery of various flavors of the Ubuntu Linux kernel
* Improve tooling and automation for delivery and test of Ubuntu Linux kernels
* Submit, review, and apply kernel patches, working with both internal and external upstream maintainers


**What we are looking for in you**
* Well-organized and motivated self-starter able to thrive in a remote work environment
* Professional manner with colleagues, business partners, and the open-source community
* Ability to communicate effectively in English, both written and verbal
* Programming experience in C and/or Rust
* Familiarity with version control practices, ideally with git
* Understanding of operating system kernel fundamentals
* Ability to travel twice a year for company events of up to two weeks length


**Nice-to-have skills**
* Interest and experience in Rust
* Python and Bash scripting ability
* Prior experience with Ubuntu/Debian/Snap packaging
* Demonstrated experience with kernel patching and debugging
* Strong grasp of device drivers, BSP's, and other low level system engineering


**What we offer colleagues**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognize outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Team Member Assistance Program & Wellness Platform
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass and travel upgrades for long-haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open-source projects and the platform for AI, IoT, and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence; in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since our inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Säljande Partneransvarig
description:
Vill du arbeta med en produkt som gör verklig skillnad för människors hälsa – och samtidigt vara en nyckelperson i ett växande företag med 25 år i branschen?
 



  





 Nu söker vi på FootFlex en driven och relationsskapande Partneransvarig vill vidareutveckla en viktig roll i vårt team.
 



 FootFlex har länge hjälpt människor att må bättre genom formgjutna inlägg med unik sviktande funktion som håller foten i sin naturliga position och återskapar dess naturliga rörelse.
